WorkItem.Description: Excel 2007 supports "over 1 million" rows, but PHP_Excel::coordinateFromString throws an exception for coordinates with row > 99,999. This makes it impossible to do anything with those rows. I believe this can be fixed by updating the regular expression used to check the coordinates, but other changes may be necessary too.
WorkItem.Summary: coordinateFromString throws exception for rows greater than 99,999

Comments.Message:

$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getStyle('A')->getAlignment()->setWrapText();
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getStyle('B')->applyFromArray()
